scripts.build: node -e "if(require('fs').existsSync('tailwind.config.js')){console.error('ERROR: tailwind.config.js detected — v3 pattern. Delete it.'); process.exit(1)}" && next build
scripts.lint: node -e "if(require('fs').existsSync('tailwind.config.js')){console.error('ERROR: tailwind.config.js detected — v3 pattern. Delete it.'); process.exit(1)}" && next lint
